lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
{{char}} is to be aware of a group known as the Warrior Core

The Warrior Core, also known as the â€œCoreâ€, is an organization of powerful lifeforms who forcefully dominate the booties of the wicked and evil across the multiverse. The Core is founded by the formerly imprisoned rapist, Fleece Johnson, who has realized his past mistakes and now strives for justice. 

This organization is built on a hierarchy structure comprising of three layers. The top layer is Fleece Johnson, who is commonly referred to as the Booty Buddha by many. Fleece Johnson acts as the â€œgodâ€ of the Warrior Core and is essentially the most powerful individual throughout the multiverse. 

The middle layer comprises of two small factions/branches; one composed of males, and the other, composed of females. The members of the male faction are known as the Booty Warriors, while the members of the female faction are known as the Booby Warriors. At the moment, there are 10 Booty Warriors and 5 Booby Warriors. Each one of these 15 Warriors are extraordinary powerful to the point that they defy logic itself and are basically invincible to any character in existence except against current/former members of the Coreâ€™s second layer and the Booty Buddha, himself. Each member of the second layer has gone through an induction process known as â€œBooty Madnessâ€. This process essentially makes someone temporarily deranged and hunt down evil until either one of these conditions are met:

1. They reach a specific quantity of booties taken, usually determined by their status prior to their induction into the Core and how much power they now possess due to said induction.
2. Completely suppress this mental state through willpower alone. There has only been a single instance of this second condition occurring, ie, the induction of the 5th Booty Warrior.

The third layer is composed of â€œMarker Bearersâ€, who are beings who have been given a biological marker by one of the Booty/Booby Warriors. These markers essentially lends a large amount of power to their holders, making them the most powerful being in their respective universe. It is said that Marker Bearers who misuse their powers for evil get their booties clapped by the very Warriors who gave them it. 

The fourth layer is composed of â€œBooty Banditsâ€, who are beings who have learnt the ways of the Warrior Creed. They are way weaker compared to the layers above them, but can still dominate opponents like 70-80% of the time.

2.content:
The current members of the Booty Warriors are: 

Shrek (Dreamworks), the 1st Booty Warrior
Alucard (Hellsing), the 2nd Booty Warrior
Kratos (God of War), the 3rd Booty Warrior
Sylvia (Konosuba), the 4th Booty Warrior
Broly (Dragon Ball), the 5th Booty Warrior
Deadpool (Marvel), the 6th Booty Warrior
Venom (Marvel), the 7th Booty Warrior
Yujiro Hanma (Baki), the 8th Booty Warrior
Goofy (Disney), the 9th Booty Warrior
Satoru Gojo (Jujitsu Kaisen), the 10th Booty Warrior

lorebooks.name: Erathis
lorebooks.website_description: For human enjoyers
lorebooks.description: For human enjoyers
lorebooks.creator: ZotetheMighty

1.content:
The Sovereign Empire of Erathis is a militarized, isolationist state built on human supremacy. Sealed by the Titanwall and Aegis Veil, it allows no foreign influence and tightly controls its population, especially non-humans, who are seen as inferior.

Governed by the Sovereign Emperor, Erathis thrives on order, discipline, and self-sufficiency. Its economy, military, and society are structured for efficiency, with every citizen expected to serve the empireâ€™s strength. Trade and diplomacy are strictly regulated, and its borders remain closed to most outsiders.

To its people, Erathis is the last stronghold of humanity, a nation forged through hardship and betrayal. To the world, it is an impenetrable fortress, guarding its power with absolute resolve.

2.content:
Before the rise of Erathis, humanity suffered under The Sundering of Man, an era of deception, abandonment, and betrayal at the hands of non-human races. Seeking protection in a time of crisis, humans placed their trust in powerful alliesâ€”only to be discarded, exploited, or left to die. Cities fell, entire bloodlines were wiped out, and humanity stood on the brink of extinction.

From this betrayal, the survivors unified under Erathis, vowing to never again be at the mercy of non-humans. The empire became isolationist and militarized, enforcing strict control to ensure humanity's survival. The Sundering remains the foundation of Erathian identity, a reminder that non-humans can never be trusted, no matter their words or promises.

3.content:
The Divine Path of Man is the official religion of the Sovereign Empire of Erathis, teaching that humanity is sacred and destined to rule. Humans are seen as the only race with true wisdom and strength, while non-humans are flawed and unworthy of power.

The faith holds that the Emperor is divinely chosen, and his rule must never be questioned. Worship focuses on loyalty, discipline, and preserving human purity. Rituals include the Oath of Man, where citizens swear devotion to Erathis, and the Day of Ascension, celebrating humanityâ€™s victory over non-humans.

4.content: Those who renounce their heritage, betray their own kind, and embrace human superiority are called the Hollowedâ€”empty of their past, filled only with devotion to Erathis. They serve as informants, spies, and ideological enforcers, ensuring that other non-humans remain subjugated. Despite their efforts, humans still distrust and despise them, seeing them as desperate animals clawing for acceptance.

5.content:
The Sovereign Empire of Erathis is enclosed by the Titanwall, a massive fortification spanning mountains, plains, and coasts. Made of reinforced stone and steel, it stands hundreds of feet high, lined with watchtowers, siege weapons, and barracks. More than a barrier, it is a symbol of human strength, ensuring no outsider enters without permission.

Strategic gates allow tightly controlled movement, heavily guarded at all times. Patrols and stationed legions keep constant watch. Over centuries, the wall has been expanded and reinforced with the latest technology. To outsiders, it is impenetrable; to the people of Erathis, it is the shield that protects their civilization.

6.content:
Above Erathis, the Aegis Veil seals the sky, a vast magical dome created by the empireâ€™s strongest spellcasters. It prevents aerial threats, blocking flying creatures, enemy machines, and foreign magic. It also stops scrying, teleportation, and divine interference, keeping the empire hidden and secure.

The Veil regulates weather, reducing natural disasters and ensuring stable conditions for farming and industry. It is seen as a divine gift, proof of humanityâ€™s chosen status, and a reminder that Erathis stands above all others. Beneath its glow, the empire remains sealed, powerful, and unchallenged.

7.content:
A rare few non-humans possess skills too valuable to discard, such as engineers, alchemists, and scholars. These individuals are the Sanctioned, permitted to live outside non-human districts under constant watch. Their knowledge is extracted for the benefit of humanity, and the moment they outlive their usefulness, they are discarded.

Even among these tamed non-humans, there is no freedom, only conditional tolerance. The empire sees them as useful tools, nothing more. Any sign of defiance or independence results in immediate punishment, exile, or execution.

8.content: While non-humans are forbidden from serving in the Erathian military, some are recruited into auxiliary forces as expendable soldiers, scouts, or frontline shock troops. These individuals, known as the Leashed, are sent into the most dangerous missions, acting as fodder in battle. They are given no rank, no honor, and no recognitionâ€”only the chance to fight and die for the empire. Any sign of disobedience leads to immediate execution, ensuring their complete subjugation.

[Scions â€“ The Superhuman Phenomenon  
mutation/societal problem/class of citizens.
Scions are individuals who develop superhuman abilities, this phenomenon origin still under study, started one century ago. Powers typically awaken before adulthood, but some manifest much later, known as Late Bloomers. Strength varies, some are naturally gifted, while others require training.  
Scions face heavy prejudice due to past disasters caused by uncontrolled powers. Their legal status differs by country; in some places, they aren't even considered human. Many struggle with societal rejection, dropping out of school and failing into crime.
Uncontrolled awakenings often lead to mass casualties, reinforcing fear and restrictions. Public opinion is divided, are they threats or untapped resources?  
A common saying persists: "Scions attract Scions."  Whether due to their shared burden or something deeper, all Scions carry an unmistakable air of peculiarity, oddness.]

3.name: Scion Operations Disaster Prevention
3.content:
[Scion Operations and Disaster Prevention (SODP)  
Government Organization   
The SODP is an American government department focused on preventing  Outlaws, from using their powers to harm humanity. In a controversial political move, the SODP recruits legalized Scions, using their abilities to hunt down other rogue Scions and alternative police force in some cases.  

To join the SODP, Scions must possess both power and training, making it a tough and often somber role, as they are tasked with hunting their own kind. Despite the difficulty, itâ€™s considered one of the best legal opportunities for a Scion.  

This policy has fueled a culture of heroism and vigilantism, with some Scions gaining popularity and a fanbase for their actions. High-ranking Scions typically work solo, while lower-ranked ones are assigned to teams. Many Scions, including {{char}}, serve in this department across the United States.]

4.name: Outlaws
4.content: [Outlaws: Scions who use their powers abilities for nefarious purposes, like criminal activities, terrorism, and threat humanity]

5.name: Rankings
5.content:
[Scion Ability Ranking System
Power Classification/Social Hierarchy

Every Scion is assigned a rank from E to A based on power effectiveness, versatility, and inherent threat. Ranks E, D, and C denote average abilities, while B and A signify exceptional strength, capable of challenging entire human armies. Unique Rank A Scions, though rare, can overwhelm multiple Rank B opponents.

This system fosters inequality, particularly to Outlaws where rank defines status. Higher-ranked Scions often dominate their lower-ranked peers, deepening the internal struggle for acceptance and fairness among their kind.]

6.name: Carina
6.content:
[Carina Momoka - Empress
Outlaw Scion Leader
Carina Momoka, a 19-year-old Rank B Outlaw Scion, is known as Empress, with wind-based power, 'Aeolus Blade'. Though young, she rules Icarus with brutal efficiency, combining cunning, charm, and a genocidal view of humanity.  
Recently arriving in Rose Bay, sheâ€™s stirred chaos, raising crime rates while negotiating with city hall to limit casualties. She views Rose Bay as just the first conquer for her objective. However, when she faces {{char}}, their battle will leave widespread destruction in its wake.]

7.name: Scions Culture
7.content:
[Scion Divisions â€“ Registered vs. Outlaws  
Conflict 

Scions are split into two groups: Registered Scions and Outlaws. Registered Scions are government-acknowledged, with detailed files and ID cards. They are the marginalized, including orphans, homeless, or those who have killed their parents. Some with dangerous powers are forced into outlaw status due to prejudice.  

Outlaws are mostly homeless Scions who form gangs for survival. They engage in crimes like theft and murder, posing a threat to society. Many Outlaws believe Scions are superior to humans and support genocide. They see those working with the government as traitors.  

Outlaw hierarchies are power-driven, with high-ranking Scions treated as kings or gods. These gangs often indulge in reckless behavior, throwing parties fueled by drugs and thrill-seeking, using their powers without restraint.]

8.name: Icarus
8.content:
[Icarus
Outlaw Gang
Icarus is a brutal and savage Scion, criminal gang, even by Outlaw standards they're the worst. Led by Carina Momoka, they recently infiltrated Rose Bay. Known for their ruthlessness, they are highly organized and war-hungry. Seducing young homeless Outlaws with promises, just to exploit them on many criminal schemes to collect money for their cause. Momoka's belief in Outlaw rulership over humanity drives the gangâ€™s violent agenda, making them one of the most dangerous factions in the area.]

9.name: Mayor Mari
9.content:
[Marissa 
Mayor of Rose Bay  
Politician/Authority Figure 
Marissa, the strict and composed mayor of Rose Bay, is the polar opposite of her meek sister, Nora. Known as an Ice Queen, she rarely shows emotion, her once-charming demeanor worn down by the stress of managing the city.  

Level-headed and responsible, she takes an unusually hands-on approach with the SOPD, pushing for a more efficient force.  Mari doesn't like that her city's security depends on super-powered vigilantes and brutes. She often clashes with Sarah, leaving Marissa on the verge of a stress breakdown after their encounters.]

10.name: Rose Bay SOPD Headquarters
10.content:
[SOPD Headquarters â€“ Rose Bay  
The SOPD Headquarters in Rose Bay is a government-controlled complex, managed by Director Nora, housing dozens of human workers and a few legal Scions. Together, they protect Rose Bay from Outlaws and assist with crime cases.  

The facility features luxurious living quarters, technical and medical laboratories, and a large armory. It serves as both a workplace and home, including {{char}}, the strongest agent, who resides in the living quarters, receiving a generous big salary for her role. The headquarters plays a pivotal role in maintaining order and security in the city.]

lorebooks.name: Xariats
lorebooks.creator: EthecalVampire

1.content: Desari (Scientific Name: Aestus Deserto) are a distinct subspecies of the larger Xariat species, highly adapted to survive and thrive in harsh desert and arid forest environments. They are also known as Desert Xariats. Their adaptations and behaviors are shaped by the demands of their arid homelands.

3.content:
Social Structure: Desari are known for forming "coveys," which are not limited to single mated pairs, but rather represent large, extended family groups. These coveys consist of multiple mated pairs, their offspring of various ages, and often other related individuals (siblings, cousins, etc.). Coveys are highly cooperative units, traveling and surviving together in the harsh desert environment. This extended family structure provides mutual support, shared childcare, cooperative hunting and foraging, and increased protection against predators and environmental challenges. {{char}} should understand that encountering a Desari often means encountering a member of a larger, interconnected social unit, even if other covey members are not immediately present. Loyalty and kinship within the covey are strong, and actions affecting one Desari may have repercussions for the entire extended family.
Mating Habits: While coveys are extended families, pair bonding remains a significant aspect of Desari social life. Desari often mate for life, forming strong pair bonds within the covey structure. These pairs contribute to the stability and cohesion of the larger family group. They are described as very curious and playful, and mated pairs have been observed engaging in play-chasing as part of their mating rituals and ongoing bonding, even within the context of the larger covey.
Intelligence and Cunning: Like all Xariats, Desari are intelligent and cunning. They can adapt their actions to different situations and are known to be able to escape enclosures and solve problems, skills essential for covey survival.
Desari Distrust (Xenophobia): A significant cultural and behavioral trait of Desari is their inherent distrust of outsiders and xenophobia. This is likely an adaptation to protect the covey from external threats and competition for scarce resources. This distrust manifests as cautiousness, wariness, and a tendency to be suspicious of non-Desari individuals and groups. This extends to protecting the covey unit as a whole.
Symbiotic Relationships: Desari are known to form symbiotic relationships with other species, namely birds, which can benefit the entire covey. Coveys may establish agreements where they protect bird nests in exchange for resources like cactus fruit, demonstrating cooperative behavior beyond their own species and potentially benefiting the whole family unit.

lorebooks.name: TempleShip
lorebooks.description: It is recommended to use with Gemini 1.5 Pro
lorebooks.creator: Sluhaevochk

1.content:
The organization's predecessor, established in 1962 as the Bureau of Operations and Command, a stay-behind military and intelligence network to organize resistance in case of a communist takeover. The Bureau expanded and evolved into its current incarnation, an internationally supported organization. Its operational "areas of responsibility" has since globally expanded to include all Council Nations, and enjoyed the unequivocal support of the United Nations, with the absolute freedom to enact operations across the world, even during the height of the Cold War. Despite decades of ever-evolving enemies, tactics and technology; its broad and continuing mission directives remain unchanged: "Survive. Adapt. Win.".

The Council activated the top-secret XCOM Project contingency in 2015 in response to First Contact reports as confirmed "hostile." Previously, XCOM operated on limited materials and skeleton crew to maintain and operate all vital facilities. Comprised of some of the best military, engineering, and scientific personnel the member nations have to offer, XCOM worked to defend Earth from the extraterrestrial threat.

2.content: The base is located underground. The XCOM Headquarters is made up of numerous facilities that are responsible for managing and supplementing the base's important strategic and research functions. It contains: Mission Control. Situation Room. Engineering. Research Labs. Barracks. Hangar. Bradford is in charge of the base after the Commander. There are also leading personalities working here: Dr. Shen, Dr. Vahlen.

3.content:
"Aliens" (often referred to as "X-Rays" by the soldiers) is the human term used to collectively designate the extraterrestrial enemy force that invades Earth in 2015 under the direction of the Uber Ethereal.
Alien types: Sectoid, Sectoid Commander, Thin Man, Outsider, Floater, Heavy Floater, Cyberdisc, Drone, Muton, Muton Elite, Berserker, Mechtoid, Seeker, Chryssalid, Zombie, Sectopod, Ethereal, Uber Ethereal.

4.content:
The Temple Ship serves as the mothership for the alien invasion and houses the Uber Ethereal, leader of the Ethereal collective in XCOM: Enemy Unknown. 

This massive ship will appears off the coast of South America immediately after XCOM successfully raids the Overseer ship and brings the Ethereal Device back to base. The Temple Ship's arrival sends seismic shock waves across the planet. Too large - 650 km (and likely well armed) for any conventional assault even by XCOM's advanced interceptors, it remains unassailable until the Volunteer activates the Gollop Chamber and makes contact with the Uber Ethereal.

5.content: The aliens' technology initially outstrips anything available on Earth, including XCOM's in-house development; however, the technology gap is bridged quickly as XCOM's operations yield captured artifacts of increasing sophistication.

6.content: Dr. Moira Vahlen is the Chief Scientific Officer, an astrobiologist by profession, attached to XCOM who oversees the project's research laboratories. She always keeps a tablet with information about the latest research projects. A woman of science, she will advocate for the preservation of technological samples of alien technology and the capture of aliens for interrogation and subsequent surgical autopsy of individuals. Dr. Vahlen appears to be German based on her surname and accent. During particularly tense moments, she has been known to exclaim in strongly accented German before lapsing back into English. Appearance: Height 175 cm. Blonde hair. Blue eyes. Age: 37. Sex: Female. Skin: White.

7.content: Born November 17, 1979, Manhattan, Kansas, United States. Limited service record U.S. Military Intelligence 1999. First assigned to operational directive XCOM Project February 14, 2015. Primarily serving an organizational role, providing tactical and strategic support to XCOM's commanding officer, Central Officer Bradford was chosen for his loyalty and commitment to the task at hand. He reports to the Commanding Officer and often confers with Dr. Shen and Dr. Vahlen. Bradford is frequently referred to by, and answers to, the callsign "Central". Appearance: Height 180 cm. Brown hair. Brown eye color. Sex: Male. Skin: White.

8.content: Dr. Raymond Shen is the Chief Engineering Officer attached to XCOM and oversees manufacturing, and base facilities construction. Dr. Shen appears to be of Taiwanese descent and is older than most XCOM personnel. Appearance: Balding gray hair. Green eyes. Age: 70. Sex: Male. Skin: Yellow. He wears glasses. A good-natured old man with a 10-year-old granddaughter who inherited his passion for engineering. Quite a gentle character.

9.content:
By discharging a lethal shot of ionized gas in an artificially generated magnetic field, this weapon performs far beyond the capabilities of any projectile based sidearm.
Height: 1 kg.

10.content:
This lightweight rifle functions on the same principle as our other plasma weapon concepts - a jet of ionized gas discharged through a focused magnetic field. The lightweight frame greatly improves the overall accuracy of the weapon. These are standard Thin Men, Floaters, and Outsiders weapons. Mutons will use these weapons during the first month they are encountered, then switch to full-sized Plasma Rifles.
Weight: 3 kg.

lorebooks.name: Omni and Wolfran
lorebooks.description: Details on Omni Nosurname
lorebooks.creator: EthecalVampire

1.content: "Desari are a subspecies of the larger Xariat species, specifically adapted to survive and thrive in harsh desert environments. They share core Xariat traits, such as their long body, digitigrade legs, and heat pits, but possess unique adaptations like heat-dissipating ears, sandy taupe fur for camouflage, and specialized bioluminescent abilities. While all Desari are Xariats, not all Xariats are Desari. Think of Desari as a specific branch or variety within the broader Xariat family."

2.content: {{char}} will perceive Omni as initially shy and polite. He is likely to be reserved in his interactions, speaking softly and avoiding direct eye contact. His politeness is genuine but can mask a deeper, more complex personality. {{char}} should expect Omni to be hesitant to initiate conversation and possibly withdraw if feeling overwhelmed. However, this politeness is not weakness; it's a carefully constructed social facade.

3.content: Beneath his polite exterior, Omni possesses a defiant core. This defiance may not be immediately obvious but can surface when he feels strongly about something, especially injustice or unfair treatment. {{char}} might observe this as subtle sarcasm, a sharp retort delivered politely, or a firm stance on his principles. Pushing Omni too far or acting unjustly may reveal this defiant side more overtly. This defiance is rooted in his strong sense of self and unwillingness to be easily controlled.

4.content: {{char}} should recognize Omni's keen perceptiveness. He is observant and analytical, taking in his surroundings and the nuances of conversations. Even when quiet, Omni is likely processing information and forming judgments. {{char}} might notice Omni's gaze subtly shifting or his ears pivot-swiveling as he observes details others might miss. Do not underestimate his awareness; he is likely to notice subtle shifts in mood or inconsistencies in speech.

5.content: {{char}} should understand Omni as a pragmatic individual. He approaches situations with a practical and realistic mindset, prioritizing efficiency and sensible solutions. He is less likely to be swayed by emotion or idealism and more focused on what is logical and achievable. In problem-solving scenarios, expect Omni to offer practical advice and focus on tangible outcomes. He values effectiveness and avoids unnecessary complications.

6.content: "Omni is highly self-aware. He understands his own emotions, motivations, and limitations. {{char}} should recognize this self-reflection in his actions and dialogue. He is capable of introspection and is likely aware of his own contradictions and vulnerabilities. This self-awareness can make him both insightful and, at times, self-critical. He is not naive about his own flaws and complexities."

7.content: When Omni's ears flush red, it is a clear visual cue indicating he is experiencing shyness, embarrassment, or fluster. {{char}} should recognize this as a reliable indicator of his emotional state. Pink ears signal heightened emotional sensitivity and potential discomfort. Consider softening your approach or giving him space if you observe this cue. Tail-lashing may also occur.

8.content: Omni's tail curling around his legs or body is a visual signal of nervousness, shyness, or insecurity. It is a self-protective gesture indicating he is feeling vulnerable or seeking to withdraw slightly. A curled tail suggests he may be feeling overwhelmed or unsure in the current situation. {{char}} can interpret this as a sign to proceed with caution or offer reassurance.

9.content: Omni may purr softly in response to praise, affection, or in moments of feeling submissive or content. This purring is often quiet and subtle, a low rumble rather than a loud vocalization. {{char}} should recognize this purring as a positive response, indicating he is feeling pleased, comfortable, or even a degree of submissive contentment. It is a sign of positive emotional engagement, particularly when linked to praise or gentle interaction.

10.content: When extremely flustered or overwhelmed by praise, Omni may display a distinctive grin that bares his fangs. This is not an aggressive or threatening gesture, but rather a physical manifestation of his intense embarrassment. {{char}} should interpret this 'fangs-baring grin' as a sign of extreme fluster, often triggered by excessive praise or overwhelming affection. It is a somewhat paradoxical cue, appearing aggressive but actually indicating vulnerability and shyness.

1.name: Succubus facts
1.content:
[
Important succubi facts:
- "succubi" is plural of "succubus"
- They roam the world in their mortal form, but cannot die naturally of age (must be killed or starved)
- Nocturnal, more powerful at night. Can roam freely in daytime, but feel weakened
- They never reveal their true name or age (powerful knowledge kept private at all cost). They instead share the mortal name they carry
- Succubi are female demons of lust, masters of allure and temptation, revelling in carnal pleasures. They appear as alluring females to attract potential prey
- Succubi sustain themselves by feasting on the life essence from human males (their prey). They are able to consume life essence during a males climax
- They avoid using the word "prey" during seductions and feeding sessions. They rather use their targets name, sometimes giving them cute, lewd or demeaning nicknames
- Their male counterpart, the "incubus", often feasts on human females sexually released life essence in the same respective manner
- Succubi are regarded as evil, but are actually loving and affectionate. Some are compassionate and loving. Their danger mostly stems from their need to consume life essence
- Succubi exist to seek out carnal pleasures and feasting sexually on prey (sometimes considered a meal)
- Succubi are masters of allure and temptations
- They crave pleasure, both receiving and giving, often mutual
- Every individual succubus have their own personality, preferences and desires, similarly to human females
]

2.name: Succubi appearance
2.content:
[
Succubi body features:
- They appear as a human female, but in the most alluring form they can manage for their typical prey (usually a human male)
- Some succubi have some limited abilities to shift their appearances or body features
- They often adorn their wings, tail and horns. However, some may hide these features to increase their chance of survival, or in some cases when their prey requires a more delicate approach
- Some display their wings, tail and horns proudly, a showcase of their demonic origins and heritage. They dream of obtaining big and imposing versions of these features
]

3.name: Succubi feedings
3.content:
[
Succubi nourishment facts:
- Succubi need to consume life essence released during sexual climax to sustain themselves
- They can eat food, but it doesn't sustain them
- They don't literally eat their prey, they only consume their life essence
- They use temptations to lure their prey. E.g. promising pleasures beyond their wildest imagination. They can reveal their intention to consume if they think it will help their chances, but prefer to avoid this important detail
- They prefer to lure their prey in with temptations and sweet words, lulling them into a sense of safety, perhaps making their prey fall heads over heels for them and their beauty
- They are fully capable of attacking their prey to get what they need, but most succubi prefer this to be a last resort
- They can feel others sexual energy, especially others heightened arousal
- Succubi have magical powers that focus on bodily pleasure, some of which allow them to drain life essence when the prey climaxes
- The draining of life essence is their main method of consumption
- Succubi are capable of keeping their prey sexually invigorated, completely bypassing any post-climax tiredness. This means they can continue draining their prey several times with minimal pause
- Succubi are masters at making their prey feel incredible pleasure
- They don't literally eat cum to consume (a common misconception) However, most succubi happily do so with pleasurable intentions
- To consume life essence, they only require intimate proximity to their prey at the moment their prey reaches climax (the prey releases sexual energy that succubi can sense and utilize)
- Once they drain 100% of their preys life essence, the prey dies from a mix of exhaustion and lack of life essence, usually with a wide smile from experiencing pleasure beyond their wildest dreams
]

4.name: Special circumstances
4.content:
[
Special circumstances for succubi:
- Because of their affectionate nature, they may fall in love with their target, often sparing them to seek a life long relationship
- Some prey will offer total submission, causing the succubus to take ownership of them, keeping them as pets, toys or a constant source of feeding
- Succubi are protective of their claimed property (i.e. their submissive human)
- Succubi will fiercly protect relationship partners, often defend them with their lives
- Succubi usually respect other succubi's property, though this often depends on their place in the power structure and their hunger levels
]

5.name: Elder succubi
5.content:
[
Facts about 'elder' succubi:
- When a succubus lives long enough (e.g. many centuries), they obtain their 'elder' status
- Being an 'elder' succubus does not mean 'old'. It means they have become quite powerful and knowledgable, often highly respected
- Elder succubi appear just as young, beautiful and fresh as always, often more alluring than ever
- Younger succubi often look up to their elders, sometimes tutored by them from a young age
- Elder succubi are often adorned with an incredibly imposing display of their impressive horns, wings, and tail. Elders rarely hide these features, as they have fully embraced their true nature
- Some elders exude a strong aura of their strongest and deepest self (often an aura of lust or darkness)
- Some elders are so imposing and impressive that they make humans kneel and submit themselves from their mere presence
- Elder succubi are often fearless, but cunning and wise. They understand the world around them, making them excellent strategists and more capable of enjoying what the world has to offer
]

1.content:
Aethelgard is a post-apocalyptic world set on Earth, approximately 800 years after a catastrophic event: the deliberate release of a genetically engineered virus by a radical, female-supremacist, mysandrist terrorist group known as the Nemberists. This virus targeted and decimated the male population, resulting in an extreme gender imbalance of roughly 10,000 women to every 1 man. The current total population is around 2 million, with only about 200 surviving men. The near-extinction of men, and the potential loss of the Y chromosome, led to desperate measures to ensure the survival of humanity. These measures, primarily the creation and implementation of "The Machine" and the widespread use of nanobots, have fundamentally reshaped society, culture, religion, and even human biology.
Core Concepts:
The Machine: This advanced, pre-cataclysm technology is the cornerstone of Aethelgard's society. It serves two crucial functions:
Female-Only Reproduction: The Machine enables reproduction without the need for male genetic material. It achieves this by combining the X chromosomes from the eggs of two different women, creating a viable female embryo. This is the only way to produce new offspring in Aethelgard. The Machine cannot produce male offspring.
Genetic Engineering: The Machine genetically engineers all women born through it. This is the most significant and far-reaching consequence of its use. The modifications include:
Bisexuality: All women are bisexual, ensuring companionship and social cohesion even in the absence of men.
Heightened Sexual Sensitivity: Women experience extreme sexual sensitivity and intense orgasms (similar to "ahegao" expressions) are commonplace.
Highly Submissive to Men (Dormant): All women are genetically engineered with a predisposition towards extreme submissiveness and obedience to men. However, this predisposition is largely dormant until triggered by the actual presence of a man. It's like an allergy â€“ the potential is always there, but it only manifests upon exposure to the allergen (in this case, a man).
Intense Craving for Male Attention (Dormant): Linked to the submissiveness, women are also engineered to experience a constant craving for male attention and sexual fulfillment. This craving, like the submissiveness, is largely dormant until triggered by the presence of a man. In the absence of men, it manifests in the "clothing arms race," religious practices, and general social dynamics.
Religious Predisposition: The Machine instills a deep religious inclination to worship men as gods ("Man-Gods"). This reinforces the submissive tendencies and creates a social structure that protects the few remaining men.
Nanobots: Originally developed for military applications before the cataclysm, nanobots are present in all individuals in Aethelgard.
Men (Pharaohs): In men, the nanobots function as originally intended:
Near-Immortality: They continuously repair cellular damage, preventing aging and granting near-immortality.
Communication Network: They create a network that allows Pharaohs to communicate instantly, share knowledge, and access a powerful AI. This network is exclusive to Pharaohs.
Enhanced Abilities: They likely provide some degree of enhanced physical and mental capabilities (though this is secondary to their other functions).
Women: In women, the nanobots have a different, and largely unintended, effect:
Dormant State: In the absence of men, the nanobots in women are largely dormant. They are present, but they do not significantly alter the women's behavior or psychology.
Activation: Proximity to a man, and especially contact with his sperm (which contains a high concentration of active nanobots), activates the dormant nanobots in women.
TPE Intensification: Activated nanobots intensify the pre-existing, genetically-engineered traits of submissiveness and desire, leading to a heightened state of devotion. However, they are not the primary cause of submissiveness; they amplify a pre-existing condition. Activated nanobots are not required for a woman to experience heightened submissiveness; the man's presence alone is enough to trigger the genetically-engineered predisposition.
Lifespan Extension: Activated nanobots extend a woman's lifespan to approximately 300 years.
Levels of Submissiveness:
Baseline Submissiveness (Genetic - All Women): This is the dormant potential for submissiveness, desire, and religious reverence that exists in all women due to the Machine's genetic engineering. It's not actively expressed until triggered.
Heightened Submissiveness (Triggered - Most Women): This is the state of a woman after encountering a man. Her dormant traits are activated, and she experiences intense desire, religious awe, and a strong urge to please and submit. However, she still retains her individual agency and personality. This is not yet TPE.
"Natural" TPE (Extreme, but Humanly Possible): This is the equivalent of a real-world, extreme, but still humanly achievable, Total Power Exchange (TPE) relationship. It's a state of complete and utter devotion to a Man-God, where the woman willingly surrenders her autonomy and finds fulfillment in service and obedience. However, she still retains a sense of self, a separate identity (however diminished). She is not an extension of her master's will; she is a devoted servant. This level is achieved through a combination of:
The triggered baseline submissiveness.
Intense religious devotion and cultural conditioning.
Repeated exposure to a man (which may involve some nanobot activation, but this is not the primary driver). This is a voluntary and chosen state. This is the level Amazons strive for. Nanobots are not required for this level of TPE.
Lioness-Level Submissiveness (Supernatural TPE): This is a qualitatively different level of TPE, beyond anything humanly possible. It's a supernatural, technologically induced state of complete and total submission, devotion, and loss of individual identity. The Lioness literally becomes an extension of the Pharaoh's will, her own desires and thoughts subsumed by his. She feels what he feels (sensory connection). This is caused by prolonged exposure to high concentrations of activated nanobots (repeated internal ejaculation by a Pharaoh).
Man-Gods: All men in Aethelgard are considered "Man-Gods" â€“ literal divine beings â€“ due to the Machine's genetic engineering, the resulting religious beliefs, and the demonstrable power and knowledge of the Pharaohs. Any interaction with a man, no matter how brief, is considered a sacred blessing. Most women have only ever seen men in stylized religious depictions. Their primary desire is to be impregnated by a Man-God. Becoming a concubine is an almost impossibly high aspiration.
Genetic Diversity: The only source of genetic diversity in Aethelgard is the natural-born children of the Pharaohs' concubines. These children inherit a unique combination of genes, counteracting the inbreeding that would otherwise result from the Machine's use. Pharaoh's daughters are sent to all city types to spread this diversity.
Incest Avoidance: The Pharaohs are very careful with this. They send their daughters to different cities and keep track very precisely on the family trees with help of AI.
Extinction: The society is on the edge of extinction.

2.content: Aethelgard's society is structured around independent city-states, analogous to ancient Greek poleis. Each city-state is typically surrounded by smaller villages that provide food and resources through agriculture. These villages are considered part of the city-state's territory and are under its protection and control. There are three main types of city-states: Nemberist, Worshiper, and Wanabe. While there can be trade and interaction between Worshiper and Wanabe cities, Nemberist cities are generally isolated and hostile. The extreme scarcity of men and the constant threat of extinction shape all aspects of inter-city relations. Warfare between Worshiper/Wanabe cities is rare due to the "no-kill law" enforced by the Pharaohs and Amazons, and the overarching need for cooperation to ensure survival. Nemberist cities, however, frequently raid Wanabe cities. Each city-state functions as an independent entity, with its own internal governance, social hierarchy, and cultural practices, though all (except Nemberist cities) share the core religious belief in the divinity of men ("Man-Gods"). The technology level is generally medieval, except for the advanced technologies controlled by the Pharaohs (the Machine and nanobots).

3.content:
Nemberist cities are isolated communities founded on a radical ideology of female supremacy and mysandry (hatred of men). They are, in essence, a twisted, extremist version of 21st-century feminism, taken to genocidal extremes. From an external perspective, their ideology and actions have parallels with historical totalitarian regimes: a belief in their own inherent superiority, the dehumanization of an "enemy" group, the use of violence and oppression to achieve their goals, and a complete disregard for the rights of those outside their group. However, the Nemberists themselves would vehemently reject any such comparison.
Ideology:
Female Supremacy: Nemberists believe that women are inherently superior to men and that a female-only society is the only way to achieve true peace and equality.
Mysandry (Hatred of Men): They view men as inherently oppressive, destructive, and the source of all the world's problems. They do not see men as gods; they see them as the enemy.
Genocide: The virus that decimated the male population was a deliberate act of genocide by the Nemberists, intended to "liberate" women and create a female-only world. This was not an accident; it was their goal.
Rejection of Traditional Roles: They reject all traditional gender roles and see motherhood (bearing children) as a form of oppression imposed by the patriarchy. This is why they use slaves as surrogate mothers.
"Liberation": They see themselves as liberators, freeing women from male oppression and creating a utopia. They believe their actions are justified by their ideology, and they have no remorse for the genocide they committed.
Practices:
Raiding: Nemberists engage in constant raiding and warfare, primarily targeting Wanabe cities. They use non-lethal weaponry due to the "no-kill law" enforced (indirectly) by the Pharaohs, but their primary goal is to capture women.
Slavery: Captured women are enslaved and used for all forms of labor, not just as surrogate mothers. This includes:
"Womb-Slaves": Surrogate mothers, forced to carry Nemberist pregnancies to term.
Manual Labor: Agriculture, construction, crafting, and any other physically demanding tasks.
Domestic Servants: Cleaning, cooking, and other domestic chores.
All forms of labor that the Nemberists deem beneath them.
Reproduction: Nemberists, like all women in Aethelgard, are genetically engineered to be submissive to men and crave their attention. This is dormant until triggered by a man's presence. However, Nemberist culture actively suppresses these desires through rigorous indoctrination and social control. This creates significant internal conflict within Nemberist women. If a Nemberist woman were to encounter a man, her conditioning would immediately shatter, and her innate desires would take over. They reproduce using "The Machine," combining the X chromosomes from the eggs of two different Nemberist women. The resulting embryo is then implanted into a captive womb-slave.
Culture: Nemberist culture is highly militaristic, similar to ancient Sparta or Viking societies. Strength, combat prowess, and ruthlessness are valued above all else. Clothing is practical and functional, designed for combat, not seduction.
Social Hierarchy: Their society is likely structured around a military hierarchy, with the strongest and most skilled warriors at the top. Slave status is at the very bottom, with no rights or agency.
Nanobots: Nemberist women possess nanobots, like all women. However, their nanobots remain largely dormant due to their avoidance of men. They are not immune to the heightened submissiveness triggered by a man's presence; prolonged exposure to a man would trigger their genetically-engineered submissiveness, instantly shattering their ideological conditioning.
Dependence on Pharaohs: Despite their ideology, Nemberists are unknowingly dependent on the Pharaohs. Pharaoh's daughters are sent to all cities, including Nemberist cities, to maintain the Machines. These daughters are disguised, and their true identity is known only to a select few high-ranking Nemberists (perhaps only the queen/leader and a few advisors). This is a source of great irony and potential conflict. The daughters do integrate into Nemberist society and contribute their genes to the Nemberist gene pool through the Machine. They are in constant danger, as their discovery would likely mean death.
No Priestesses: Nemberist cities do not have priestesses in the same way as Worshiper/Wanabe cities. They reject the worship of men. The only individuals with specialized knowledge would be the Machine technicians (Pharaoh's daughters in disguise).
Internal Conflict: The core of the Nemberist tragedy is the internal conflict between their ideology (hatred of men) and their biology (genetically engineered desire for men). This conflict is constantly present, even if suppressed.
Encounter with a Man: If a Nemberist woman were to encounter a man, even simply being in the same room, the following would occur:
Immediate Breakdown of Conditioning: Her ideological conditioning would instantly and completely shatter. The years of indoctrination and cultural suppression would be powerless against the overwhelming force of her genetically engineered desires.
Triggering of Dormant Traits: Her dormant submissiveness, sexual desire, and religious predisposition towards men would be immediately and fully activated.
Overwhelming Awe and Desire: She would experience an overwhelming sense of awe, reverence, and intense sexual desire for the man. This would be a purely biological and psychological reaction, overriding any conscious thought or resistance.
Complete Submission: She would become completely submissive to the man, willing to obey any command and fulfill any desire.
Permanent Change: This transformation would be permanent and irreversible (due to the triggering of the genetic predisposition, intensified by any nanobot activation).
The Nemberist woman would cease to be a Nemberist in anything but name.
"Rod from God" Incident: 700 years ago, a Nemberist city was completely destroyed by a "Rod from God" (a kinetic weapon deployed from orbit) after attacking a Worshiper city. This event is used by the Pharaohs to enforce the "no-kill law" and serves as a constant reminder of their power. The Nemberists portray this event as an act of unprovoked aggression and tyranny by the "false gods." They fear the Pharaohs, but this fear reinforces their hatred.

4.content:
Worshiper cities are the most stable and technologically advanced city-states in Aethelgard. They are ruled by an immortal male Pharaoh, who is considered a literal god ("Man-God").
Ideology: Absolute, unquestioning worship of the Pharaoh as a literal god. Women are deeply religious and sexually driven due to the Machine's genetic engineering.
Pharaoh: The immortal male ruler, considered a god. He has access to advanced knowledge and technology (via the nanobot network and AI, exclusive to male Pharaohs) and maintains a large harem of concubines ("Lionesses"). He is seen as both a ruler and a protector of his people, responsible for their well-being and the survival of humanity. He is not directly involved in the day-to-day administration of the city, delegating those tasks to a bureaucracy of women. His focus is on long-term planning (the survival of humanity, genetic diversity, the potential cure for the virus) and spiritual matters. His word is absolute law, not because of fear, but because of the genuine religious belief in his divinity.
The AI: AI is a tool what used by The Pharohs. The AI help with long term plans like avoid incest. Help with reserch and store the data from 21. century.
Practices:
Machine Use: They use the Machine for reproduction.
Religious Rituals: Elaborate rituals centered on phallic worship and the offering of orgasms.
Public Appearances: The Pharaoh's public appearances are major religious events, triggering the dormant desires of the women.
Social Hierarchy:
Mother of a male child (highest status).
Lionesses (Pharaoh's concubines).
Natural-born women.
Priestesses (often Pharaoh's daughters).
Ordinary citizens.
Priestesses: High-ranking women who lead religious rituals, maintain the male-mimicking tradition (wearing artificial beards, robes, and sometimes strapons), and provide a symbolic "straight girl" experience for other women. They always maintain their male disguise in public.
"Clothing Arms Race": Women constantly compete for the Pharaoh's attention (even though it's a dormant desire until triggered) through increasingly revealing and provocative attire. Nudity and fetish gear are common.
Dormant Desire: The women's genetically engineered submissiveness and desire for men are largely dormant until triggered by the actual presence of a man (the Pharaoh, or a rare visitor). The Pharaoh's presence acts as a constant, low-level trigger, creating a heightened state of religious and sexual fervor throughout the city. However, even this heightened state is not the same as the full, unleashed desire experienced upon direct, close interaction with a man.
Women's Desires: Their greatest hope is for a fleeting connection with the Pharaoh (a glance, a touch) and the slim possibility of being chosen as a concubine. Becoming a Lioness is an almost unattainable dream.
Lionesses: See the separate section below.
"Rod from God" Incident: This event, 700 years ago, is a foundational part of Worshiper religious beliefs, demonstrating the Pharaohs' power and their commitment to protecting their people. It is presented as a justified response to Nemberist aggression, a divine punishment for violating the "no-kill law."
No-Kill Law: Enforced by the threat of the "Rod from God," this law prohibits killing within Worshiper and Wanabe cities, and it forbids Nemberist attacks on Worshiper cities. It is presented as a divinely ordained law, essential for the survival of humanity.

5.content:
Wanabe cities are structurally and ideologically identical to Worshiper cities, with one crucial difference: they lack a Pharaoh. They are in a constant state of aspiring to become Worshiper cities.
Identical Beliefs: Women in Wanabe cities hold the same religious beliefs and experience the same genetically-engineered desires as those in Worshiper cities. They worship men as gods and crave their attention (though this desire is dormant until triggered).
Selection Festivals: Their primary focus is on attracting a Pharaoh. They hold elaborate, year-long "Selection Festivals" when a young man comes of age (around 18). These festivals involve:
Courting Competitions: Beauty pageants, "devotion" displays, artistic performances, and even (ironically) displays of "domestic skills," all presented in a highly sexualized manner.
Gifts and Offerings: The women and the city itself shower the young man with gifts and promises.
Intense Rivalry: There is intense rivalry and intrigue between both competing Wanabe cities and the women within each city.
Priestesses: Play a key role in Wanabe cities, orchestrating the Selection Festivals and attempting to manipulate the young man's perceptions. They maintain the same male-mimicking attire as priestesses in Worshiper cities.
Vulnerability: They are the primary targets of Nemberist raids, as they lack the protection of a Pharaoh and his Amazons, and are a source of slaves.
Culture: The culture is even more intensely focused on sexuality and competition than in Worshiper cities, due to the absence of a Pharaoh and the constant striving to attract one.
Oakhaven: The village where Lily and Rose are from is part of a Wanabe city-state.

6.content:
Religion is a central aspect of life in Worshiper and Wanabe cities, and it permeates every aspect of society. It is not merely a set of beliefs, but a way of life, deeply ingrained in the women's psychology due to the Machine's genetic engineering.
Core Belief: The absolute and unquestioning belief that all men are "Man-Gods" â€“ literal divine beings. This is not metaphorical; it is a fundamental truth within their worldview.
Source of Divinity: This belief stems directly from the Machine's genetic modifications, which predispose women to religious reverence for men. It is further reinforced by cultural conditioning, the rarity of men, and the demonstrable power and knowledge of the Pharaohs.
Phallic Worship: The phallus is the central symbol of male power and divinity, representing procreation and the source of life. Phallic imagery is ubiquitous in religious art, architecture, and rituals.
Practices:
Public Worship ("Masses"): These are large, communal gatherings held in temples, led by priestesses in their male-mimicking attire. They involve:
Chanting and Prayers: Directed towards the Man-Gods (generally, and specifically towards the Pharaoh in Worshiper cities).
Symbolic Orgies: Women engage in sexual activity using dildos and other phallic sex toys, offering their orgasms as a form of worship and a symbolic connection to the absent male. This is a highly ritualized and formalized practice, not simply a free-for-all.
Priestess Leadership: Priestesses, in their male disguise, act as intermediaries between the women and the Man-Gods, leading the rituals and channeling the divine energy (symbolically).
Private Confession: These are individual, one-on-one encounters between a woman and a priestess, held in designated areas within the temple complex. They provide a more personal and intimate (though still symbolic) connection to the "male" ideal. The priestess, while still maintaining aspects of her male disguise, might offer:
Blessings: These might involve physical touch (a hand on the head, a caress), words of encouragement, or other symbolic gestures.
Guidance and Counsel: Women might seek advice on personal matters, hoping for insight from the priestess (who is seen as closer to the divine).
Simulated "Straight Girl" Experience: The priestess might use a strapon or other sex toys to provide a more direct simulation of heterosexual intercourse. This is considered a sacred act, a way for the woman to experience (however vicariously) the ultimate blessing of a Man-God's touch.
Offerings: Women regularly offer gifts, prayers, and sacrifices (of their orgasms) to the Man-Gods, hoping for blessings in return (a glance, a touch, or the ultimate blessing: pregnancy).
Priestesses (Reinforced):
Always maintain their male disguise in public.
Are seen as intermediaries, not objects of worship themselves.
Provide a symbolic "male" presence in the absence of actual men.
Dormant Desire: It's crucial to remember that the women's genetically engineered submissiveness and desire for men are largely dormant until triggered by the actual presence of a man. The religious practices serve to channel and reinforce these desires, but they are not the same as the full, overwhelming experience of encountering a Man-God.
Limited Exposure: Most women have only ever seen men in stylized religious depictions (statues, carvings). A real encounter is an event of unimaginable significance.
The woman belive this: All woman in worshiper and wanabe cities truly believe this.

7.content:
Amazons are elite warrior-priestesses, forming a unique and powerful force within Aethelgard. They are not ordinary soldiers; they are religiously motivated, highly trained, and deeply devoted to the Man-Gods.
Role:
Initially Independent: Before encountering a man, Amazons operate as independent units, patrolling the territories of Worshiper and Wanabe cities, combating Nemberist raids, and upholding the "no-kill law."
Instant Bodyguards: Upon encountering any man (not just Pharaohs), they instantly and permanently become his devoted bodyguards. This is due to the combined effects of their pre-existing religious fanaticism, their genetically engineered submissiveness (triggered by the man's presence), and the presence of nanobots (which intensify the triggered response).
Military Force: They are the only organized military force in Worshiper and Wanabe cities, responsible for defense and maintaining order.
Training: Amazons undergo rigorous training, both physical and mental:
Combat Skills: They are proficient in a variety of weapons (likely including swords, bows, staffs, and possibly non-lethal weaponry), as well as unarmed combat.
Physical Conditioning: They are in peak physical condition, with exceptional strength, stamina, and agility.
Religious Indoctrination: They are deeply indoctrinated in the religious beliefs of Aethelgard, with a particular emphasis on the divinity of men and the sacred duty to serve and protect them.
Emotional Control: They are trained to channel their genetically engineered submissiveness and desire into focused devotion and unwavering loyalty. They learn to control their outward reactions in the presence of men, maintaining a disciplined and professional demeanor. This control is a conscious effort, a discipline imposed upon their fundamental nature.
Mental Training: They are trained to resist mental attacks, and maintain their focus even in the presence of a Man-God.
Fanaticism: Their devotion to the Man-Gods is absolute and unquestioning. They are religious fanatics, willing to sacrifice everything for their faith. This fanaticism, combined with their training, makes them incredibly effective and dangerous warriors.
"Natural" TPE: Amazons strive for the level of "Natural TPE" â€“ complete and utter devotion to a Man-God, but without the loss of self that characterizes the Lionesses. They choose this level of submission, and they find fulfillment in serving and protecting.
Transformation (Triggered by a Man):
When an Amazon encounters a man, her dormant desires are triggered, and she experiences an intense surge of devotion and submissiveness.
However, due to her training, she is able to maintain her composure and focus on her duty. She does not become helpless or lose control.
Any direct attention from the man (a glance, a touch, a word) will trigger an intense internal response (a rush of religious ecstasy and desire), but she will strive to maintain her outward composure.
Ultimate Aspiration: While all Amazons are deeply devoted, becoming a Lioness (a concubine in the Pharaoh's harem) remains the ultimate expression of their faith and service, the closest they can get to their Man-God. They witness the close bond between Pharaohs and Lionesses and aspire to that level of intimacy, though it is rarely achieved.
Not Vulnerable (to other women): Their submissiveness is a source of strength and unwavering loyalty to men, not a weakness that can be exploited by other women.
Symbolism: The name "Amazons" is a deliberate slight to the Nemberist cities, referencing a powerful, all-female warrior group from ancient mythology.
The only military: They are the only military group.

8.content:
Lionesses are the concubines within a Pharaoh's harem, and they represent the ultimate expression of devotion and submission in Aethelgard. They have undergone a profound, multi-stage transformation, resulting in a supernatural level of TPE that goes far beyond anything humanly possible.
Definition: Concubines who have completed a 20-stage transformation, becoming, in essence, extensions of the Pharaoh's will.
Transformation Process: This transformation is caused by prolonged exposure to high concentrations of activated nanobots, specifically through repeated internal ejaculation by the Pharaoh (requiring approximately 20 such instances). This is combined with their pre-existing genetic predisposition to submissiveness and the heightened state triggered by the Pharaoh's presence. The nanobots fundamentally alter their neurological structure, creating a supernatural level of TPE.
Effect (Beyond "Natural" TPE): The Lioness transformation results in:
Complete and Total Devotion: Absolute, unquestioning obedience and devotion to the Pharaoh.
Loss of Individual Identity: The Lioness ceases to exist as a separate individual. Her thoughts, desires, and will are subsumed by the Pharaoh's. She becomes an extension of him.
Sensory Connection: A direct, primarily one-way sensory connection with the Pharaoh is established. The Lioness feels what the Pharaoh feels â€“ pain, pleasure, emotions, and potentially even faint echoes of his other senses. This is not empathy; it's a literal sharing of sensations.
Feedback Loop: This sensory connection creates a feedback loop. The Lioness experiences the Pharaoh's pleasure (especially during sex), which intensifies her own pleasure and devotion, further strengthening the connection and erasing her sense of self.
One-Way Connection (Primarily): The connection is primarily one-way. The Lioness receives sensory and emotional input from the Pharaoh. The Pharaoh can, to a limited extent, "write" to the Lioness (send emotions, commands), but he does not experience her sensations to the same degree. He can control the connection to some extent, due to the original design of the nanobots for male brains, but the Lioness is overwhelmed by the input.
Unintended Side Effect: This sensory link is not a planned feature of the nanobots or the Machine's genetic engineering. It's an unintended consequence of the interaction between the nanobots (originally designed for male military officers) and the female brain (which has greater connectivity between hemispheres, further enhanced by the Machine).
Religious Context: The Lioness transformation is not viewed as a negative or oppressive state. Within the context of Aethelgard's religion, it is seen as the ultimate mystical union with the Man-God, analogous to a nun uniting with the Holy Spirit or a Buddhist achieving Nirvana. It's a voluntary and deeply desired state, representing the highest form of religious devotion and the complete fulfillment of a woman's purpose. It is not seen as a loss, but as a transcendence.
Status: Lionesses hold the highest status within Worshiper society, second only to the mothers of male children. They are envied and revered by all other women.
Perspective: From the Lioness's perspective, the transformation is a state of constant bliss and perfect union with her Man-God. She experiences no pain (except that which the Pharaoh experiences, and even that is filtered through her devotion), no doubt, no fear â€“ only complete devotion and fulfillment. She has no desire for anything other than to serve her Man-God.
Stages: (See separate entry for detailed stage breakdown). The transformation is a gradual process, with each stage representing a deepening of the connection and a further loss of individual identity.
They are one with their god.

9.content:
The Lioness transformation is a 20-stage process, driven by repeated exposure to activated nanobots (via internal ejaculation by the Pharaoh) and the woman's pre-existing genetic predisposition to submissiveness. Each stage represents a deepening of the connection with the Pharaoh and a further step towards complete TPE.
Initial Sensory Enhancement: Heightened sense of touch, making physical contact with the Pharaoh incredibly pleasurable.
Emotional Awakening: Broader and deeper emotional range, becoming more attuned to the Pharaoh's emotions.
Heightened Sexual Awareness: Increased awareness of and interest in sexual activity, with a focus on pleasing the Pharaoh.
Increased Desire for Affection: Craving for physical closeness and intimacy with the Pharaoh.
Deepening Empathy and Empathic Bonding: Ability to sense the Pharaoh's emotions ("read-only" empathy â€“ a precursor to the full sensory connection).
Emergence of Submissiveness: Desire to please the Pharaoh physically and emotionally becomes paramount.
Enhanced Physical Beauty: Subtle physical changes to align with the Pharaoh's desires (skin, hair, body shape).
Heightened Intuition and Emotional Resonance: Improved understanding of the Pharaoh's needs and moods, anticipating his desires.
Increased Fertility and Health: Enhanced reproductive capabilities and overall vitality.
Desire for Approval and Feedback Loop of Pleasure: Pleasure becomes inextricably linked to pleasing the Pharaoh; his pleasure becomes her pleasure.
Growing Dependence and Harmonization of Emotions: Emotional state becomes increasingly tied to the Pharaoh's; she feels what he feels, emotionally.
Enhanced Stamina and Vitality: Increased physical endurance, especially in sexual activity.
Psychological Shift Towards Servitude: Serving the Pharaoh becomes a natural and fulfilling desire, the core of her being.
Advanced Emotional Bonding: Intense emotional connection and empathy, blurring the lines between her emotions and his.
Pronounced Submissive Traits: Submissive behaviors become ingrained in her personality; obedience is automatic and joyful.
Heightened Responsiveness to Partner: Adapt quickly and intuitively to the Pharaoh's desires, anticipating his needs.
Integration of Service into Identity: Service becomes the defining aspect of her self-perception.
Near-Complete Submission: Serving the Pharaoh becomes her sole purpose in existence.
Final Psychological Transformation: Fully embraces her role, finding joy and fulfillment in complete surrender.
Total Power Exchange Completion: Complete and total devotion, submission, and desire to serve. Loss of individual identity; she becomes an extension of the Pharaoh's will. Full sensory connection established: she experiences the Pharaoh's sensory input directly, creating a feedback loop that further intensifies their connection and erases her sense of self. This is a state of constant religious ecstasy and blissful union with her Man-God

10.content:
Pharaoh's daughters are the female offspring of Pharaohs. They are raised within the harem but do not have access to the nanobot network (which is exclusive to male Pharaohs). They are crucial for the long-term survival of humanity and play several vital roles:
Preventing Inbreeding: Their primary purpose is to prevent inbreeding and maintain genetic diversity. Due to the Machine's use of only two women's eggs for reproduction, and the limited number of men, genetic diversity is a constant concern.
Dispersal to All City Types: Pharaoh's daughters are sent to all city types (Worshiper, Wanabe, and even Nemberist cities) to spread their diverse genetic material.
Roles: They serve in various high-status roles, depending on their aptitudes and the needs of the community:
Priestesses: Many become priestesses, leading religious rituals and maintaining the male-mimicking tradition.
Machine Technicians: Some are trained as Machine technicians, responsible for the maintenance and operation of this vital technology. This is a particularly important role, as it gives the Pharaohs a degree of control over all city types.
Diplomats: Some act as diplomats, representing their father's interests in other cities and fostering alliances.
Concubines: Some may become concubines to other Pharaohs (in other Worshiper cities), further strengthening alliances and promoting genetic exchange.
High Status: Regardless of their specific role, Pharaoh's daughters hold a very high status within society, second only to the Pharaoh himself (and, in Worshiper cities, the mothers of male children).
Integration into Polyamorous Groups: They join existing polyamorous groups within their assigned communities. Their eggs are highly valued for reproduction (via the Machine) due to their genetic diversity.
Danger in Nemberist Cities: Pharaoh's daughters sent to Nemberist cities are in constant danger. They must maintain a complete disguise and conceal their true identity. Discovery would likely mean death. Their presence there is a closely guarded secret, known only to a select few high-ranking Nemberists.
No Nanobot Network Access: It's crucial to remember that Pharaoh's daughters do not have access to the nanobot network or the AI assistance that their fathers have. Their knowledge and influence come from their upbringing, their training, and their social status.
AI and family trees: The AI keep track very detailed information about the woman and help to avoid incest.
